title: Pastor

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, visit a player, Blessing them and all their visitors tonight. If a Blessed player would die, instead you delay their death for 2 nights. Their delayed death cannot be prevented for any reason.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Players undergoing their delayed death may not use abilities at night.
- The attacker of a Blessed player will be told their defense was too strong to kill.
- Players will not be notified they were Blessed unless their death is delayed.
- You are Blessed at all times.

fields.name: Background:
fields.value: - For the first 2 nights, you are Blessed.

desc:
Post 4690
*There's comfort in the holy items you carry.*
